author: Victoria O
title: Birthday weekend
text:
I stayed here for 2 nights for a weekend trip to London to celebrate my 40th birthday. Although obviously not in Central London, it is well connected with the Jubilee & Central lines on the Underground, the DLR & also Overground services which made getting about very easy. It's right by the Westfield shopping centre, which is great for shopping, food, cinema & a casino. I also found that the location meant it was a very reasonable price.
The hotel is clean & comfortable, the staff very friendly and helpful. We could have checked in online a couple of days before but part of the link didn't seem to work for me but checking in on arrival was quick and easy. My friend & I booked separately, which unfortunately meant our rooms were on different floors but the receptionist said if we'd contacted them in advance they probably would have been able to get us next to each other - which was fair enough & useful to note for future trips. My friend, rather amusingly - to her! - put 40th birthday banners on my room door & when we came back from our day out, in my room I found a bottle of prosecco, box of chocolates and a 40th birthday card from the staff at Premier Inn!! I guess the birthday banners were a bit of a clue but it was a really lovely surprise.
I have stayed here on one previous occasion & specifically chose to stay here again. It was just as good, if not better, than last time. I will definitely plan on staying here again on future trips to London.
